name: Rising snake:The present world
description:
《腾起之蛇现世》《Rising Snake Present World》
It is a horror game based on Qimen Dunjia and Feng Shui, with the Nine Palaces of Qimen Dunjia as a reflection, showcasing the winding stories that take place on a real sized university campus.

Game Features
Abandoning past horror games, there are cabinets for good news and cabinets for bad news. Play this game in a combat style that aligns with China's Qimen Dunjia. The game contains a lot of professional knowledge about Qimen Dunjia, Feng Shui Kanyu, and making runes and symbols. Players who like magic can enjoy a feast of blessings, while horror game enthusiasts who do not understand magic can also play freely.
The hand decision system based on the Nine Palaces includes attack spells based on the Five Acts


Auxiliary Mantra adapted from Qimen Dunjia


In the game, some real spells have been adapted into relevant decryption games


There are also many unique props in the game as "helpers" to assist players in playing


Don't forget the most important Qimen Dunjia system, please look forward to the Qimen Visualization Plate at that time!


background story
Why are the classmates' eyes so strange on a peaceful and beautiful university campus? Why are there frequent homicides on campus? Is the teacher the murderer or the student the murderer or... is it human harm, ghost harm, or ghost harm? What strange story has happened in this school? At that time, please ask all the Taoists to investigate.
